name: (The Last True) VHS Collector
description:
-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-

Hello, world! There are 5 hidden VHS cassettes with encrypted messages in this game. Every day at 00:00 (UTC/GMT+3) the video conent of the cassettes would change along with their location in the game till doomsday. Internet access is required to play the game. Good luck...

-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-#-

An important word from the author. We all have entered a new era, but not everyone understand what is really happening with the modern society.

Due to the war in Ukraine, I have a serious problem finding a job. If you have the opportunity to support author as well as this project - follow me in a Telegram and make a donation there (this is the most convenient way). I am thankful to everyone who will support me.

The game is under development. If you want to suggest an idea or your own video content, you can also write in my Telegram group.

https://t.me/vhscollector
